Package com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector

A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LanguageDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading language tagged text from a training corpus.
    LanguageDetectorFeature<T>  
    LanguageDetectorProcessor
    Any class that can process results found by a language detector.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLanguageDetectorFeature<Y>
    An Abstract base class for language detector features.
    CharacterNgramFeature  
    DefaultLanguageDetectorProcessor
    A processor which writes each block of text followed by a list of possible languages and probabilities.
    LanguageDetector
    Detect the language of a text.
    LanguageDetectorEventStream
    A ClassificationEventStream for language detection training.
    LanguageDetectorFeatureFactory
    A factory for creating language detector features from descriptors.
    LanguageDetectorTrainer
    Reads various configuration parameters and trains a sentence-detector model.
    LanguageTaggedText  
    TextPerLineCorpusReader
    A default corpus reader which assumes one text per line.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector Description

A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line. Currently it assumes a sentence is in a single language.
